setup:
$$ f(x,y) = 4x+4y $$

1. Write an equation describing the contour line for \(f(x,y)=z\).

2. What is the y-intercept of the contour line for \(f(x,y)=64\)?

3. What is the x-intercept of the contour line for \(f(x,y)=64\)?

$$ f(x,y) = x+y $$
